properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 1:54AM AKST until February 11 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Plan on areas of poor
visibilities and slick roadways to create difficult travel
conditions at times. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Wind chills to 55
below.

* WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast.

* WHEN...Noon Monday to 6 PM Tuesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as
low as 55 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10
minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of
blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road
conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM AKST TUESDAY
